mapper.select: SELECT e.employeeID ,e.positionID ,e.name,e.status ,e.joinDate ,e.phoneNumber ,e.address ,e.remainingAnnualLeave ,e.departmentID ,e.rankID,d.responsibility,h.branchID FROM department d JOIN headquarters h ON d.hqID = h.hqID JOIN employee e ON e.departmentID = d.departmentID where e.employeeID= #{param1} and e.password = #{param2}
